sn35.165:1.1: Atha kho annataro bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankami …pe…
sn35.165:1.2: ekamantam nisinno so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn35.165:1.3: “katham nu kho, bhante, janato katham passato micchaditthi pahiyati”ti?
sn35.165:2.1: “Cakkhum kho, bhikkhu, aniccato janato passato micchaditthi pahiyati.
sn35.165:2.2: Rupe aniccato janato passato micchaditthi pahiyati.
sn35.165:2.3: Cakkhuvinnanam aniccato janato passato micchaditthi pahiyati.
sn35.165:2.4: Cakkhusamphassam aniccato janato passato micchaditthi pahiyati …pe…
sn35.165:2.5: yampidam manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi aniccato janato passato micchaditthi pahiyati.
sn35.165:2.6: Evam kho, bhikkhu, janato evam passato micchaditthi pahiyati”ti.
